name: SOUTHWEST AIRLINES PILOT ASSOCIATION
sampleDescriptions: Lobbied in opposition to language in S. 1405 to water-down 1,500 hours of training requirement for first officers.
Lobbied in support of HR 2150, the Flags of Convenience Don't Fly Here Act, which requires applicants for Foreign Air Carrier Permits adhere fully to our Open Skies Agreements before US DOT can grant
